short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CyberPass boosts your online security by checking for compromised passwords, creating unique ones, and teaching password security.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CyberPass is an extension that takes your online security seriously. It offers a range of features designed to keep your sensitive information secure. With the help of haveibeenpwned.com database, CyberPass can check if your passwords have been compromised in past breaches, ensuring that you stay safe from potential data breaches. The extension also generates unique and secure passwords to protect your accounts and teaches you about password security etiquette. CyberPass is a must-have tool for anyone who wants to stay safe and secure online. Install it now and take the first step towards a safer digital world.
